### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (-0.5, -9.5)
- Boiler at position (-19.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-10.5, 25.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (0, 0) and a furnace at position (0, 0)
- Burner mining drill at position (5, 5) and a furnace at position (5, 5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting boiler to steam engine
- Ensure there are no placement blockages when connecting pipes between the boiler and steam engine. Check the surrounding area for any obstructing entities.

### Errors with electricity connections
- Make sure that all electricity groups are properly connected to power sources. Verify the status of each electricity group and ensure they are plugged into the electric network.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target tile.
